product_name: Shimano SH-51 Lateral Release SPD Cleat
long_description: Replacement SPD cleats for heavy off road and pavement riding. These are less likely to release with upward stroke or pull. Releases in lateral twist mode, with 4 degrees of float. Stock replacement cleat for all Shimano SPD pedals including A520, A530, M324, M424, M520, M540, M770, M970. Worn cleats can lead to poor pedal function including premature release or stubborn release. Frequent riders should replace their cleats at least once per year, and casual riders less often.
short_description: Replacement SPD cleats for heavy off road and pavement riding. These are less likely to release with upward stroke or pull.
